entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon then 40 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Risk of snow squalls late this afternoon. Blowing snow over exposed areas this afternoon. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 80. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 31 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending overnight then cloudy. Risk of snow squalls this evening and after midnight. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 80 becoming northwest 60 gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 over exposed areas after midnight. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 10 in the morning then rising. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 10 in the morning then rising. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 04 February 2023
